isis.stitle: HYDRO-MAX™ BRAKE BOOSTER AND MASTER CYLINDER - DESCRIPTION - MONITOR MODULE

svcproc.title: MONITOR MODULE
svcproc.para: Refer to Figure 1 for all items in parentheses.

The monitor module is located inside the cab. The primary purpose of the monitor module is to monitor the electrical integrity of the Hydro-Max™ booster backup pump (Item 2), relay (Item 4) and flow switch (Item 3) operation. The monitor module is the device that turns on the brake warning light in the vehicle instrument panel. For a more detailed explanation of the monitor module, refer to GROUP 08 - ELECTRICAL in the CTS-5000 Master Service Manual.
